name: MDLScatteringFunction
desc: A set of material properties that describes a basic shading model for materials, and the superclass for more complex shading models.

items.name: var name: String
items.desc: A descriptive name for the scattering function.

items.name: var baseColor: MDLMaterialProperty
items.desc: The inherent color of the material, to be used as a modulator during shading.

items.name: var emission: MDLMaterialProperty
items.desc: The color emitted as radiance from a material’s surface.

items.name: var specular: MDLMaterialProperty
items.desc: The intensity of specular highlights on the material’s surface.

items.name: var materialIndexOfRefraction: MDLMaterialProperty
items.desc: The index of refraction for the medium surrounding a material.

items.name: var interfaceIndexOfRefraction: MDLMaterialProperty
items.desc: The index of refraction for a material itself.

items.name: var normal: MDLMaterialProperty
items.desc: The variation in the surface normal vectors in a material, relative to model coordinate space.

items.name: var ambientOcclusion: MDLMaterialProperty
items.desc: The attenuation of ambient light due to local geometry variations on a surface.

items.name: var ambientOcclusionScale: MDLMaterialProperty
items.desc: The scaling factor for ambient occlusion shading.
